title: [Feature request] Negative padding for F.pad but not convolution functions?
body_html:
I am using a Conv2d layer that requires negative padding, and I can achieve this by using F.pad and Conv2d with appropriate padding values. It seems like it would be cleaner and possibly more efficient(?) to be able to do it with only the layer parameters though.

Is there a reason why the valid padding values for convolution functions are not consistent with F.pad?
